QuestData.Title: Rebels on the Road
QuestData.Description:
This is unacceptable. The stoneborn rebels have ambushed a convoy intended for the Tithelord. He is the local Harvester who rules this ward.
We need to get through this mess. The bridge on the far side of this conflict leads to Darkhaven. The Master typically keeps some of his own Stone Legion forces there.
Carve us a way through, Maw Walker. Destroy any who would delay us. We must not keep Sire Denathrius waiting.
QuestData.RewardText: Your talents in combat show promise. Perhaps with a few more centuries and a little humility we might make something of you.
